messages.title: Election Communication
messages.content: "Mid Derbyshire has been taken for granted for too long. I pledge to give YOU the voice that you deserve, and represent OUR interests as a community."

keyPolicies.policyTitle: An NHS for everyone - not for profit
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Our NHS nurses and doctors deserve the resources they need and we deserve to keep our NHS public.
Saving lives and keeping people safe from extreme climate breakdown. Protecting our environment.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: The right homes in the right places
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensure that we build good homes where needed. Ensuring land-banking and empty properties give way to homes for families.
National Education Service, Radical care NHS, Your voice in Parliament, Free TV licenses, Bus services - climate change

issues.health: An NHS for everyone - not for profit

community.content: The right homes in the right places

contactInformation.address: Unit 3, Marble Hall, Nightingale Road, Derby, DE24 8BF

endorsements.endorsement: Emma's life long instincts when tackling injustice whether close to home or on the world stage gave me the great confidence to support her.
I'm backing Emma Monkman to be the Labour Candidate for Mid Derbyshire.
